document.full_text: sudanese militia have killed 17 people in the oil-producing south kordofan region just two weeks before long-delayed elections, a candidate for state governor said on thursday.
document.title: militia kill 17 before polls in sudan state: splm
lines_and_colors: sudanese militia have killed 17 people in the oil-producing south kordofan region just two weeks before long-delayed elections, a candidate for state governor said on thursday.
